name: INFO_REQ_CNCT_REF_NUMS
description: This table contains information about Reference Numbers on Additional Information Contacts.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the Additional Information Request record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REFERENCE_NUM
columns.description: Stores an identifier to uniquely identify this Additional Information Contact in this system.

columns.name: REF_NUM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Denotes the type of identifier used to identify this Additional Information Contact in this system.
